The rebirth for the much loved 'Historical Revival' mod is here!
<br />All credit goes to Jedo_Dre for originally developing this mod.

<br />IN DEVELOPMENT!
descriptionHtml:
The rebirth for the much loved 'Historical Revival' mod is here!

[b][i][font=Georgia][size=6]Historical Revival Reborn![/size][/font][/i][/b]

[size=3][u][b]About this mod:[/b][/u]
[/size]
I picked this mod up after it was left in the desert to die so to speak...


[youtube]YtvFIHiMmI4[/youtube]


[b][u][size=3]GOALS:[/size][/u][/b]

[size=2]I plan to make the mod almost scriptless as many people use many mods for Skyrim, and as we know,[/size]
[size=2]Skyrim is written in 32bit code and not 64bit. What this means is that Skyrim can only use a fixed amount of memory.[/size]
[size=2]This memory size is decent but when you're using HD mods and other mods with lots of script, it can get messy.[/size]
[size=2]This usually result in frequent CTDs (crash to desktop). I want this mod to be so light it won't be a burden for any PC.[/size]

[u][b][size=3]Features:

[/size][/b][/u]Roman armour
Roman weapons
Roman names for months of the year
Roman names for gods

[u][b][size=3]Changelog:[/size][/b][/u]

-Updated from original mod to 0.1

* Removed all other armours, only concentrating on Roman. Sorry! :(
* Cleaned the .ESP file

[b][u][size=3]BUGS:[/size][/u][/b]

None as of yet... Play, test and let me know if you find any.

[b][size=3][u]CREDIT:
[/u][/size][/b]
All credit goes to Jedo_Dre and his team for originally developing this mod.
author: lordzionleader
